work_item.name: Feature Implementation
work_item.title: ‚ú® Feature Implementation
work_item.description: Template for implementing a new feature or capability.
work_item.content:
## Objective
Briefly describe what this feature accomplishes and why it matters.

## Requirements
- [ ] Core functionality requirement
- [ ] User-facing requirement
- [ ] Technical requirement

## Implementation Notes
Key technical decisions, architecture considerations, or dependencies.

## Done When
- [ ] Feature works as specified
- [ ] Tests pass
- [ ] Code reviewed

work_item.name: Bug Fix
work_item.title: üêõ Bug Fix
work_item.description: Template for tracking and resolving bugs.
work_item.content:
## Problem
Describe the bug: what's happening vs what should happen.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. First step
2. Second step
3. Observe the issue

## Root Cause
What's causing this? (Fill in after investigation)

## Solution
- [ ] Fix implemented
- [ ] Regression test added
- [ ] Verified in staging

work_item.name: Technical Improvement
work_item.title: üîß Technical Improvement
work_item.description: Template for refactoring, optimization, or tech debt work.
work_item.content:
## Current State
Describe what exists today and why it needs improvement.

## Proposed Change
What will be different after this work?

## Impact
- Performance: 
- Maintainability: 
- Risk level: 

## Validation
How will we know this worked?

High-level architecture and key components.

cycle.name: Sprint Planning

## Committed Work

- [ ] Item 2 (X points)
- [ ] Item 3 (X points)

## Capacity

- Committed: X points

## Risks
Anything that might block us?

cycle.content:

- Feature/fix 2

## Checklist

- [ ] QA passed

epic.name: Technical Initiative

epic.description: Large technical project like migration or platform work.
epic.content:

What technical challenge are we addressing?

## Proposed Solution
High-level approach and architecture.

## Phases
1. **Discovery:** Understand scope (X weeks)
2. **Implementation:** Build it (X weeks)
3. **Rollout:** Deploy and migrate (X weeks)

|------|------------|------------|
|      |            |            |
